nodes.text: Dorovio Bold was a human female who flew as a Rebel pilot in the Starfighter Corps of the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Fleet during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Bold had fair skin, brown eyes and black hair.

Dorovio Bold was portrayed by Vivienne Chandler, in cut scenes from Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. Footage of Chandler filming scenes in the cockpit during the Battle of Endor suggests that she was one of the pilots making the final assault on the Death Star, and that she would have been killed when her fighter suffered fatal stabilizer damage. That footage was finally released in 2013 in the digital edition of The Making of Return of the Jedi.

Bold was not named in the film itself, but received identification in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, which was released on September 25, 2005. The name was then confirmed to be canon in the reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia, which was released on April 4, 2017.

Bold's helmet first appeared as Luke Skywalker's blast shield helmet in A New Hope, and the prop was again reused as Darnell Reggs' helmet in the Legends video game Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire. A helmet of a similar design was used by pilots Nozzo Naytaan and Attico Wred in 2016's Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
